name: RedSquareClicker
description:
Welcome to RedSquareClicker, where you buy upgrades and click!

Ever heard of hit games such as cookie clickers or pick crafter? Well this game is kind of like that, except everything is a square! Its just meant to be played for fun!

Getting bored of the red square. There are skins from hit games such as Geometry dash, Minecraft, and even among us!

Will you make it to the top, and even beat the Highscore? Play to find out!
